metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44499 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to theYottaDB code base). Using crafted input, an attacker can cause a call to$Extract to force an signed integer holding the size of a buffer to take ona large negative number, which is then used as the length of a memcpy callthat occurs on the stack, causing a buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
